name: Shinobi No Noboru
description:
Synopsis:

You are ninjas who are training on a waterfall to upgrade your skills.

Mechanics:

Jump over the logs and survive a longer time than your rival.

Controls:
  1. Movement - A, S
  2. Jump - W
  3. Shoot - Space bar
Developed by
  • Germán López Gutiérrez
  • Ignacio Atance Loras
  • Jorge Sánchez Sánchez
  • Alberto Romero Abarca

No more to say. We expect you to enjoy this game
